name: AIsylum
description:
Unravel secrets behind the chatgpt-powered characters in AIsylum.

Welcome to AIsylum, a haunting asylum teeming with enigmatic AI-powered individuals who guard their secrets with an iron grip. Your mission? Earn the trust of the enigmatic cat girl, and other patients as you delve into their deepest, most sinister truths. But beware, not everyone is as they appear, and peril lurks around every corner.

Unleash your creativity with our AI character editor, where you can craft your own unique personas. Explore a diverse range of models and scenes to bring your chilling narrative to life, and share your meticulously designed characters with fellow adventurers.
